issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Compile the attached application and run on device
2. When the license alert is displayed on 4.0.2 device click on the background and on 2.3.6 device click the hardware back button

Actual:
The alert is dismissed and the user can continue to use the application

Expected:
Should not be able to dismiss the alert except by pressing ok to quit the application
fields.summary: Android: Module License: v8/rhino: The alert indicating that you are not licensed to use the module can be dismissed from back or click on the background
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.9.201202141208
SDK: 1.8.2.v20120223174636
Device: Nexus Galaxy 4.0.2 & Nexus S 2.3.6

comments.body: Tested with 2.0.0.v20120307090205 with Nexus Galaxy 4.02 and Nexus S 2.3.6
